General.Name: RDE Inc
General.Description: RDE, Inc. owns and operates a restaurant deal space in the United States. The company operates Restaurant.com that connects digital consumers, businesses, and communities offering approximately 200,000 dining and merchant deal options at 187,000 restaurants and retailers to 7.8 million customers. It sells discount certificates for restaurants, as well as complementary entertainment and travel offerings, and consumer products on behalf of third-party merchants. RDE, Inc. is based in Arlington Heights, Illinois.
General.Address: Lakeside Corporate Court, Norcross, GA, United States, 30093
